.. _`design_system_components_checkbox`:

CheckBox
========

.. figure:: images/component_checkbox.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Checkbox component that enables the input and display of boolean options (checked/unchecked).
The checkbox component can also incorporate a third state (indeterminate), which is neither checked nor unchecked.
In contrast to the :ref:`design_system_components_radio` component users can select many checkboxes per group.
